name: Bird factory
description:
Help the birds fill their storehouse with logs. The birds remember commands you've given and will repeat them, so for example you can tell a bird to repeatedly collect logs and place them somewhere.

This is a proof of concept rather than a playable game. It was my first time making a factory builder (automation) style game and also my first time making pixel art! (Though the majority of art in the game is by other artists following the LPC style.)

Controls

Left click: Select birds, place conveyors
Right click: Give commands, remove commands
Space bar: Toggle whether the bird repeats the commands you've given
Arrow keys: Rotate conveyors when placing them

Credits

Almost all the visual assets are thanks to other artists. Full credits here.
